示例

##基础Tree

\n

用于多层目录的嵌套结构的数据。

\n
\n\n
\n\n\n
\n
$(document).ready(function () {\n var viewModel = {\n treeSetting:{\n view:{\n showLine:false,\n multiSelect:true\n }\n },\n dataTable: new u.DataTable({\n meta: {\n 'id': {\n 'value':""\n },\n 'pid': {\n 'value':""\n },\n 'title':{\n 'value':""\n }\n }\n })\n };\nvar app = u.createApp();\n app.init(viewModel);\n var data = {\n "pageIndex": 1,\n "pageSize": 10,\n "rows": [\n {\n "status": "nrm",\n "data": {\n "id": "01",\n "pid": "root",\n "title": "f1"\n }\n },\n {\n "status": "nrm",\n "data": {\n "id": "02",\n "pid": "root",\n "title": "f2"\n }\n },\n {\n "status": "nrm",\n "data": {\n "id": "101",\n "pid": "01",\n "title": "f11"\n }\n },\n {\n "status": "nrm",\n "data": {\n "id": "102",\n "pid": "01",\n "title": "f12"\n }\n },\n {\n "status": "nrm",\n "data": {\n "id": "201",\n "pid": "02",\n "title": "f21"\n }\n }\n ]\n }\n // $.ajax({\n // type: 'GET',\n // url: 'treeJson.json',\n // dataType: 'JSON',\n // async: true,\n // success: function (data) {\n\n // }\n // });\n viewModel.dataTable.setData(data);\n window.app=app;\n $("#addOneRow1").on("click",function(){\n var row={\n "status": "nrm",\n "data": {\n "id": "202",\n "pid": "02",\n "title": "f22"\n }};\n //先创建行模型，然后将数据插入行\n var r=new u.Row({parent:viewModel.dataTable});\n r.setData(row);\n //新增一行\n viewModel.dataTable.addRow(r);\n });\n $("#deleteOneRow").on("click",function(){\n var index=viewModel.dataTable.getSelectedIndex();\n //console.log(index);\n viewModel.dataTable.removeRow(index)\n });\n $("#deleteAllRows").on("click",function(){\n viewModel.dataTable.removeAllRows();\n })\n});
\n
\n
